title: Selected
description: Two powerful changelings feel helpless when the council assigns them as a mated pair. Fiery Rajini is offered to Ray, an arrogant beta to the highest Alpha. She's not the only one dissatisfied with the situation though - Ray has no intention of taking a mate either. The two struggle against their fates, becoming unexpected allies against ancient traditions. A story of trial, honor, and passion, Rajini and Ray fight for the right to choose love on their terms.Book Available on Tapas and Wattpad.
author: M.L. Francis
